subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In his first start since Jan. 16, Kevin Weekes made 31 saves Friday night and the Devils scored three times in the first 12 minutes in a 5-1 victory over the Thrashers in Atlanta.
snippet: In his first start since Jan. 16, Kevin Weekes made 31 saves Friday night and the Devils scored three times in the first 12 minutes in a 5-1 victory over the Thrashers in Atlanta.
